name: Sakir Sezer
content: Business Card | School of Electronics, Electrical Engineering and Computer Science | Queen's University Belfast Top Business Card Professor Sakir SezerPhD E-mail: Phone: +44 (0)28 9097 1770 Fax: +44 (0)28 9097 1702 Research Profile: pure.qub.ac.uk/en/persons/sakir-sezer Room: G/47Institute of Electronics, Communications and Information Technology,Titanic Quarter PostalAddress: The Institute of Electronics, Communications and Information Technology (ECIT) Queen’s University Belfast NI Science Park Queen’s Road Queen’s Island Belfast BT3 9DT Research Interests:   Tele- & Data Communication Systems, Intergraded Circuit Design, Reconfigurable Systems, Network Processing Architectures, System on a Chip. Research Clusters:   Centre for Secure Information Technologies (CSIT) School & University Responsibilities:   ERASMUS-SOCRATES Co-ordinator Industrial project Co-ordinator Member of the Faculty International Committee External Activities: Program Committee Member, Irish Signals and Systems Conference (ISSC) in 2001, 2002 and 2003. Steering Committee Member, Irish Signals and Systems Conference (ISSC) in 2001, 2002 and 2003. Appointed as General Chair to organise the Irish Signals and Systems Conference in 2004 in Belfast, Northern Ireland. Program Committee Member, Reconfigurable Architectures Workshop (RAW 2003, RAW 2004). Publicity Chair and Industrial Exhibition Organiser of FPL 2001.
